name: ReactBoard
author: CalaMariGold
description: Provides a command (`reactboard`) to show messages with the most reactions in the server, with an option to filter by emoji. Tracks reactions using event listeners.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores message IDs, channel IDs, and reaction counts per guild to provide the leaderboard functionality. It also stores a guild setting for including NSFW channels. Data is pruned when messages are deleted or reactions are removed. No user data is stored directly.
install_msg: Thanks for installing ReactBoard! It will now start tracking reactions. Use `[p]reactboard` to see the leaderboard.
